about_the_game:
Duck Simulator 2 is a genre-defying game where you will hop between different games in an attempt to find an evil rubber duck that is attempting to ruin the developer's game!

You'll begin by quacking your way through a clicker game, but before you know it the rubber duck will go rogue and completely destroy it! From there, the developer will create several different games (each with a varying genre) for you to complete while they try to find out what went wrong with the original game. So one moment you may be shooting red capsules, but in the next you could be hopping between islands whilst trying not to fall into the void!

Features
  • Four different types of games within the campaign
  • Includes a remaster of the original Duck Simulator
  • An original soundtrack
  • Completely free

highlighted.name: I Can't Believe It's Not Pizza

Duck Simulator 2 is a genre-defying game where you will hop between different games in an attempt to find an evil rubber duck that is attempting to ruin the developer's game!

You'll begin by quacking your way through a clicker game, but before you know it the rubber duck will go rogue and completely destroy it! From there, the developer will create several different games (each with a varying genre) for you to complete while they try to find out what went wrong with the original game. So one moment you may be shooting red capsules, but in the next you could be hopping between islands whilst trying not to fall into the void!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern distro
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable GPUs
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, or CentOS 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Official graphics driver from vendors
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Duck Simulator 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“Best game I've ever played.”
Call Me Kevin

“This is a masterpiece.”
cjya

“This is art. Nothing will ever top this. I have seen the pinnacle of human creation and it is glorious.”
QueenoftheRhine
short_description: A genre-defying phenomenon that will take you on a journey to stop a rubber duck from taking over the developer's game!
